document.full_text: yuly, kazakhstan  - voters will flock to the polls in the kazakh farming community of aksu-ayuly on sunday with one thing in mind: to extend the rule of their veteran leader for five more years.
document.title: in kazakh heartland, support for leader unwavering
lines_and_colors: yuly, kazakhstan  - voters will flock to the polls in the kazakh farming community of aksu-ayuly on sunday with one thing in mind: to extend the rule of their veteran leader for five more years.
